short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to set an iframe with a custom link as a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to customize the contents of a new tab by specifying a link for the iframe. 
Note: Downloading content sites through iframes may be limited by the CORS.
